mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tennis ( region, service_id, service_status, service_name, pay_at, place_name, use_target, service_url, longitude, latitude, receipt_begin_date_Time, receipt_end_date_Time, area_name, image_url, detail_content, tel_no, service_begin_time, service_end_time, cancel_standard, cancel_standard_day, created_at ) VALUES ( #{region}, #{serviceId}, #{serviceStatus}, #{serviceName}, #{payAt}, #{placeName}, #{useTarget}, #{serviceUrl}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{receiptBeginDateTime}, #{receiptEndDateTime}, #{areaName}, #{imageUrl}, #{detailContent}, #{telNo}, #{serviceBeginTime}, #{serviceEndTime}, #{cancelStandard}, #{cancelStandardDay}, #{createdAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tennis SET service_status = #{serviceStatus}, service_name = #{serviceName}, receipt_end_date_Time = #{receiptEndDateTime}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE service_id = #{serviceId}
